data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

Some ____ join ____ clubs ____ talk ____ what ____ have ____. This is a nice way to both relax and make new friends.
data.partBlankContent: Reading books is an excellent way to relax. At t__ end o_ the d__, it's nice t_ sit do__ and en___ a no___. Also, by rea____ you c__ learn ab___ foreign la___ and peo___. Some peo___ join bo__ clubs t_ talk ab___ what th__ have re__. This is a nice way to both relax and make new friends.
data.answer: 读书是一种很好的放松方式。在一天结束的时候，坐下来欣赏一本小说是很好的。此外，通过阅读，你可以了解外国的土地和人民。有些人加入读书俱乐部来谈论他们读过的书。这是一个放松和结交新朋友的好方法。
